channel.title: Vanilla minecraft server
channel.description:
is there a specific time people usually get on and play or it just inactive? all alone currently :(
also, 1.4.7 is starting to be outdated with 1.6 coming out in a few weeks :/ any information on how this community handles the updates?

item.title: Vanilla minecraft server
item.dc:creator: @GirTheRobot GirTheRobot
item.description:
@GirTheRobot wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:13, topic:523096”][quote author=GirTheRobot link=topic=641613.msg4322481#msg4322481 date=1372385978]
so i did some research into modded survival and it looks like a lot of fun. i went to this topic MoparCraft FTB Server but says the modded survival server it whitelisted. i messaged a mate of mine up and he put together the mods needed to play the “mindcrack pack” along with a offline launcher. how do i get on whitelist?
[/quote]You can message a Moparcraft staff member to be whitelisted.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,550652.0.html#post_staff[/quote][quote=“HcoJustin, post:14, topic:523096”][quote author=GirTheRobot link=topic=641613.msg4322481#msg4322481 date=1372385978]
so i did some research into modded survival and it looks like a lot of fun. i went to this topic MoparCraft FTB Server but says the modded survival server it whitelisted. i messaged a mate of mine up and he put together the mods needed to play the “mindcrack pack” along with a offline launcher. how do i get on whitelist?
[/quote]
We actually use the latest Ultimate pack now, but message anyone with the moparcraft staff badge.
[/quote]

your responses are appreciated okay, i guess i wont be able to play for a now till my mate helps me out in a bit, thanks again. i will message one of staff who replied to this topic

Read full topic

item.title: Vanilla minecraft server
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:8, topic:523096”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=641613.msg4322394#msg4322394 date=1372377643]

What exactly is Feed the Beast? I always hear a lot about it.

http://feed-the-beast.com/
[/quote]

That site doesn’t actually say what it is, besides being a modpack.[/quote]That’s pretty much what it is.

Feed the Beast is a modpack for Minecraft. It adds a huge number of items, recipes and world-generation to the game, and is used in the YouTube series "Feed the Beast." The modpack centers on several famous mods such as IndustrialCraft and BuildCraft but the full list is extensive. All of the mods in the pack have been approved by the modders to be included. The FTB launcher was first released on Saturday, Nov. 10, 2012, with a live-stream broadcast on the Feed The Beast website.

The launcher currently features eight different modpacks for you to enjoy, including a Beta version of the Feed the Beast modpack. The official modpack release is TBD and will most likely launch once Equivalent Exchange 3 is fully updated and stable.

You might want to check this out: http://feed-the-beast.wikia.com/wiki/Feed_The_Beast_Wiki

Read full topic

item.title: Vanilla minecraft server
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“GirTheRobot, post:3, topic:523096”]oh, thats kind of disappointing is the ftb modded survival?[/quote]I wouldn’t know, I only play Vanilla minecraft (for the most part, but necessary plugins don’t count).

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:4, topic:523096”][quote author=Travas link=topic=641613.msg4322205#msg4322205 date=1372358851]
The server gets updated when Bukkit comes out with a stable build, and all plugins are updated.

Sadly, no one really plays the Vanilla server (I’m one of the few that prefer Vanilla Minecraft). Everyone would much rather play the FTB server.
[/quote]
I also would much rather play vanilla but I play whatevers most active.[/quote]I sure wish we had the community that we used to.

Read full topic
